Class SmarterBot

java.lang.Object
parade.models.player.Player
parade.models.player.bots.SmarterBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bot
public class SmarterBot extends Player implements Bot
A more advanced bot that not only minimizes the number of kicked cards, but also considers the total score of those cards to make better decisions. Implements the Bot interface and extends Player.

    Constructs a SmarterBot with the specified name.

    int
    discardCardEndgame(PlayerHand hand, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Selects the best card to discard during the endgame using the same smarter simulation logic (minimizing kicks and score).
    int
    getNextCardIndex(List<Card> hand, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Chooses the best card to play by simulating each option and selecting the one that results in the least number of kicks and lowest score impact.
    int[]
    smarterSimulation(Card chosenCard, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Simulates how many cards would be kicked and the total score of those cards if the given card were played.

    • smarterSimulation

      public int[] smarterSimulation(Card chosenCard, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
      Simulates how many cards would be kicked and the total score of those cards if the given card were played.
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - the card to evaluate
      paradeBoard - the current state of the parade board
      Returns:
      an array of size 2: [number of kicked cards, total score of kicked cards]
